actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to suspend all sales of defense articles and services for six months to Iran, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Qatar, Bahrain, the United Arab Emirates, the Sultanate of Oman, and Kuwait.

summary.text: Suspends sales of defense articles and services for six months to Iran, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Oatar, Bahrain, the United Arab Emirates, Oman, and Kuwait, unless the Presidents transmit to Congress and Congress approves by joint resolution a statement of policy with respect to sales, credit, and guarantees to such countries under the Mutual Security Act of 1954 and the Foreign Military Sales Act.

titles.title: A bill to suspend all sales of defense articles and services for six months to Iran, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Qatar, Bahrain, the United Arab Emirates, the Sultanate of Oman, and Kuwait.
